statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_count FROM inventory WHERE stock_count > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM inventory WHERE stock_count < 10 ORDER BY stock_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_count > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE stock_count > 10 ORDER BY stock_count ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_count FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY stock_count DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_count FROM inventory WHERE stock_count BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY stock_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT name, stock_level FROM product WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT id, message FROM alert ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, stock_level, id FROM product WHERE stock_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM alert WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product WHERE stock_level > 0 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, stock_level FROM product WHERE id = 1;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM alert WHERE product_id IN (SELECT id FROM product WHERE stock_level < 10);
SELECT id, name, stock_level FROM product WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY stock_level DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product p JOIN alert a ON p.id = a.product_id WHERE p.stock_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE stock_level > 10
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_time DESC
SELECT product_name, alert_message FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.product_id = alerts.product_id
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, alert_message FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.product_id = alerts.product_id WHERE alert_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, reorder_date, reorder_quantity FROM products JOIN reorders ON products.product_id = reorders.product_id ORDER BY reorder_date ASC
SELECT product_name, stock_level, alert_message, alert_time FROM products JOIN alerts ON products.product_id = alerts.product_id WHERE stock_level < 20
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 100 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT alert_id, product_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Low Stock' AND alert_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT reorder_id, product_id, reorder_quantity, reorder_date FROM reorders WHERE reorder_quantity >= 20 ORDER BY reorder_date DESC, reorder_quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Product ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%e%';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Product WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE stock_level > 100;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Product ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, current_stock FROM Product p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM User WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'manager';
